main event: Bright red or orange colored objects were observed climbing into clouds in Yuma, Arizona.
interesting points: The objects were described as slightly larger than the planet Venus., Observers initially thought the objects were falling stars., The objects made abrupt changes in course during the observation., The sighting lasted for approximately two hours., The observation was made from a drive-in theater by a knowledgeable observer familiar with aircraft.
witness description: A 3/Sgt in the USAF and his wife, both watching from their automobile at a drive-in theater.
